item.description:
If you're a beginner or advanced beginner and have been unsure about attending a regular Meetup, consider attending this one...you'll get to hit with folks of the same level and might even find a comparable hitting partner.

Based on the voting for this Meetup's time, Sat. afternoon was the top choice so let's give that a shot. (This Meetup is tentative, pending weather forecasts later in the week. We'll shoot for the first viable Sat. afternoon.)

For those who haven't been, Dugger Park (five courts) is not far from the Tufts courts and you can Google Map the address above for directions.

If attending, please RSVP and specify a best guess at your level -- e.g., "absolute beginner," "beginner," or "advanced beginner" -- in your RSVP comment. This'll give me a rough idea of how many courts we'll need and how I might be able to group people.

Finally, if you can't make it this particular w/end but would be interested in this kind of Meetup in the future, please RSVP No and indicate your interest w/ an RSVP comment so I can gauge the overall interest level.
item.how_to_find_us: "Ask for Dave; look for a guy w/ glasses and a right knee pad."
item.name: Beginners/Adv. Beginners: Saturday Afternoon at Dugger Park
